biotools.summary: A program for predicting consensus stable local optimal structures (represented by stack configurations) for aligned RNA sequences. It can be used to predict consensus alternate structures for riboswitches.

bioschemas.name: RNAConSLOpt
bioschemas.summary: A program for predicting consensus stable local optimal structures (represented by stack configurations) for aligned RNA sequences. It can be used to predict consensus alternate structures for riboswitches.
